properties.areaDesc: Hillsdale; Branch; De Kalb; Lagrange; Steuben; Noble; Cass; Williams; Elkhart; St. Joseph
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 7 at 4:23PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
At 419 PM EST, a band of moderate to heavy snow was located along a
line extending from near Dowagiac to near Lagrange to near Reading.
Movement was southeast at 25 mph.

Locations impacted include...
Sturgis, Angola, Dowagiac, Lagrange, Middlebury, Bronson, Waterloo,
Fremont, Constantine, Cassopolis, Bristol, Hamilton, White Pigeon,
Pioneer, Reading, Edon, Long Lake, Columbia, Ray and Union.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 333 and 357.
Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 10.
Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 96 and 156.
Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 9.

Conditions are expected to deteriorate rapidly as this band of
moderate to heavy snow shifts southeast. Visibilities will be
briefly drop to one quarter of a mile. Be prepared for snow or ice
covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling. This
band of moderate to heavy snow is expected to diminish in intensity
after 530 PM EST.

NWSheadline: A BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT STEUBEN...NORTHEASTERN ELKHART... NORTHEASTERN NOBLE...NORTHWESTERN DE KALB...LAGRANGE...EASTERN CASS...SOUTHERN ST. JOSEPH...SOUTHERN BRANCH...SOUTHWESTERN HILLSDALE AND NORTHWESTERN WILLIAMS COUNTIES
